analyzed: kati nu kho bhante nāgasena bojjhaṅgā ati
satta kho mahā rāja bojjhaṅgā ati
katihi pana bhante bojjhaṅgehi bujjhati iti
ekena kho mahā rāja bojjhaṅgena bujjhati dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgena ati

original: “Atha kissa nu kho, bhante, vuccanti ‘satta bojjhaṅgā’”ti?
analyzed: atha kissa nu kho bhante vuccanti satta bojjhaṅgā ti

original: “Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, mahārāja, asi kosiyā pakkhitto aggahito hatthena ussahati chejjaṁ chinditun”ti.
analyzed: tam kim maññasi mahā rāja asi kosiyā pakkhittaḥ aggahitaḥ hatthena ussahati chejjam chinditunti

original: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgena vinā chahi bojjhaṅgehi na bujjhatī”ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgena vinā chahi bojjhaṅgehi na bujjhati iti
